actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to extend certain authorizations of appropriations made by such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to extend authorizations of appropriations for National Volunteer Antipoverty Programs, National Volunteer Programs to Assist Small Businesses, and for administration of Domestic Volunteer Services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to extend certain authorizations of appropriations made by such Act.
